name: paperclip
description: - real-time editing. Biggest priority is to have a bundler that  - Interoperability. Paperclip should work with any web framework.  - Type safety.  - Visually editable.

scripts.test: npm run test:node && cd native && cargo test
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm:node && npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:watch: tsc --watch & (cd native && cargo watch -i .gitignore -i "pkg/*" -s 'wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs')
scripts.build:bundler: mkdir -p dist && yarn build:wasm:bundler && cp native/bundler/paperclip_bg.wasm dist/paperclip_bg.wasm
scripts.build:wasm:web: cd native && wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir web &&  cat web/paperclip.js | sed 's/import.meta.url/_NOOP_/g' > web/paperclip-no-import-meta.js && cd .. && mkdir -p dist && cp native/web/paperclip_bg.wasm dist/paperclip_bg.wasm
scripts.build:wasm:node: cd native && wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --out-dir node
